name: Instagram Ads Video Campaign Overview
description: Make sure your Instagram Ads are attracting attention. Drill down and get detailed video metrics on each campaign by clicking on an Ad Set name. Originates from the Gallery.

facebookAds.name: Instagram Ads Video Campaign Metrics (62 Days)
facebookAds.description: Retrieve the metrics of a specific Facebook Ads campaign. Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.label: Account
datasourceConfigModel.description: Select a Facebook Ads account, and then a corresponding campaign.

queries.errorMessage:
Here are two suggestions:

1. Make sure the Facebook account you signed in with includes a Facebook Ads account.

2. From time to time, your Facebook OAuth token will expire. This token allows you to safely bring your data into Klipfolio. Find out how to re-authorize your OAuth tokens.
